prompts: Show three ways to get all monomials in the variables x, y, and z in degree 4.

What is the regularity of the ideal (x^3 + y^3) in k[x, y]? How about in k[x, y, z]?
Write code to determine whether the ideal (x^3, y^3, xy^2) in k[x, y] has linear presnetation.
Write code to compute the krull dimension of an arbitrary ring in k[x, y, z]
What are function closures in M2?
Can I define my own class of objects?
How do I define a random ideal? Is there a package for this? Can I do statistics on random monomial ideals?
